The reason we created this process was that it's very complicated to talk about the stages of things with everyone at Atlassian.
Uh so whenever we talk about an idea, and this idea is it's super fuzzy, we don't, we're not even sure what problem area we're doing, we need to give it a name because people might assume it's further down the track otherwise, and maybe we'll come to them with a specific ask to help depending on the stage.
